Package grafioschtrader.gtnet.handler

Class AbstractRequestHandler

java.lang.Object
grafioschtrader.gtnet.handler.AbstractGTNetMessageHandler
grafioschtrader.gtnet.handler.AbstractRequestHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
GTNetMessageHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
DataRequestHandler, UpdateServerlistRequestHandler
public abstract class AbstractRequestHandler extends AbstractGTNetMessageHandler
Abstract base class for handlers that process incoming request messages. Request messages expect a response, which may be:
  • Immediate: Generated automatically via GTNetMessageAnswer rules
  • Deferred: Stored for manual admin review and later response
This class implements the Template Method pattern, providing a consistent request handling flow:
  1. Validate the request
  2. Store the incoming message
  3. Process request-specific side effects
  4. Attempt automatic response via GTNetMessageAnswer rules
  5. Return immediate response or await manual handling
Subclasses implement the abstract methods to provide request-specific behavior.

  • Method Details

    • getCategory

      public final MessageCategory getCategory()
      Description copied from interface: GTNetMessageHandler
      Returns the category of messages this handler processes. Used for validation and to determine expected response behavior.

    • handle

      public final HandlerResult handle(GTNetMessageContext context) throws Exception
      Description copied from interface: GTNetMessageHandler
      Handles the incoming message and returns a result indicating the outcome.
      Parameters:
      context - the message context containing request data and utilities
      Returns:
      the handler result indicating response type or error
      Throws:
      Exception - if processing fails unexpectedly

    • checkPriorApproval

      protected Optional<GTNetMessageCodeType> checkPriorApproval(GTNetMessageContext context)
      Checks if this request should be auto-accepted based on prior approval. Override this method to implement "repeat approval" logic where a previously approved request type from the same remote can be auto-accepted without requiring GTNetMessageAnswer rules.
      Parameters:
      context - the message context
      Returns:
      Optional containing the response code if prior approval exists, empty otherwise

    • validateRequest

      protected abstract ValidationResult validateRequest(GTNetMessageContext context)
      Validates the incoming request. Subclasses should check:
      • Required parameters are present
      • Parameter values are valid
      • Pre-conditions are met (e.g., remote domain is known)
      Parameters:
      context - the message context
      Returns:
      validation result indicating success or failure with error details

    • processRequestSideEffects

      protected abstract void processRequestSideEffects(GTNetMessageContext context, GTNetMessage storedRequest)
      Processes request-specific side effects before response determination. Called after the message is stored but before auto-response is evaluated. Use for operations that must happen regardless of the response, such as storing a new remote GTNet entity during first handshake.
      Parameters:
      context - the message context
      storedRequest - the persisted request message

    • applyResponseSideEffects

      protected void applyResponseSideEffects(GTNetMessageContext context, GTNetMessageCodeType responseCode, GTNetMessage storedRequest)
      Applies side effects after a response is determined. Called only when an automatic response is generated. Use for operations that depend on the response type, such as updating GTNet state flags after accepting a request. Default implementation does nothing. Override if response-dependent side effects are needed.
      Parameters:
      context - the message context
      responseCode - the determined response code
      storedRequest - the original request message

    • buildResponse

      protected MessageEnvelope buildResponse(GTNetMessageContext context, GTNetMessageCodeType responseCode, String message, GTNetMessage originalRequest)
      Builds the response envelope for the given response code. Default implementation creates a response message with the given code and message, stores it, and wraps it in an envelope. Override to customize response building (e.g., add payload).
      Parameters:
      context - the message context
      responseCode - the response message code
      message - optional text message
      originalRequest - the original request message (for reply linking)
      Returns:
      the response envelope ready for transmission

    • buildResponseParams

      protected Map<String,GTNetMessage.GTNetMessageParam> buildResponseParams(GTNetMessageContext context, GTNetMessageCodeType responseCode)
      Builds the response parameters map. Default implementation returns an empty map. Override to add response-specific parameters.
      Parameters:
      context - the message context
      responseCode - the response message code
      Returns:
      map of parameter names to values
